sense.def:
Representation
pomeni, da nekdo nastopa v imenu skupine ljudi, na primer v parlamentu ali kakem odboru.

seg.quote: They're campaigning for student representation on the university's governing bodies.

sense.def:
A representation of someone
je slika ali kip nekega človeka;

Representations
so uradne prošnje, pritožbe ali izjave, s katerimi se državljani obrnejo na vlado ali drugo pristojno mesto.

seg.quote: ...representations made by a group of local residents.
